sentences.sContent: I view it as a call to action, and proudly sport it as a title.
sentences.sContent_eng: I view it as a call to action, and proudly sport it as a title.
sentences.sCn: 我却把它看作一个行为的调令，并骄傲地将它作为一个标题。

sentences.sContent: On the first day he went to school,the boy wore his school cap proudly.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the first day he went to school,the boy wore his school cap proudly.
sentences.sCn: 上学的第一天，男孩骄傲地戴上了他的校帽。

synos.tran: 傲慢地，自负地；得意洋洋地
